item.title: Daughter's breathing
item.description: Video footage posted by Kwajo Tweneboa. The clip shows the breathing of the two year old daughter of a Catalyst tenant, suffering from extensive housedhold damp and mould.

item.title: Photogrammetry
item.description: As part of interview 02, I used photogrammetry to reconstruct a model of Milena’s bedroom â€“ the room she most experienced damp problems within her flat.

item.title: Shadowing a Damp Survey
item.description: In order to better understand damp housing from a technical perspective, I contacted several professional damp surveyors asking to interview them or shadow one of their surveys.
